block.p: Kelli Diane Rabke, a daughter of Barbara and Richard Rabke of West Orange, N.J., was married yesterday to Joseph Arthur Agresta Jr., a son of Nance Katherine Agresta of New York and Mr. Agresta Sr. of Englewood Cliffs, N.J. The Rev. Ronald Marczewski performed the ceremony at St. John the Evangelist Roman Catholic Church in Orange, N.J.

The bride, 33, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a singer and actress who also does voice-overs for television and radio commercials. In 1994 and 1995, she played Eponine in the Broadway production of ''Les Miserables.'' She graduated from Fordham University. Her mother, an interior decorator, works at Whitehouse Furniture in Fairfield, N.J. Her father manages safety compliance for the Daily News printing plant in Jersey City.

Kelli Diane Rabke, a daughter of Barbara and Richard Rabke of West Orange, N.J., was married yesterday to Joseph Arthur Agresta Jr., a son of Nance Katherine Agresta of New York and Mr. Agresta Sr. of Englewood Cliffs, N.J. The Rev. Ronald Marczewski performed the ceremony at St. John the Evangelist Roman Catholic Church in Orange, N.J.

The bride, 33, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a singer and actress who also does voice-overs for television and radio commercials. In 1994 and 1995, she played Eponine in the Broadway production of ''Les Miserables.'' She graduated from Fordham University. Her mother, an interior decorator, works at Whitehouse Furniture in Fairfield, N.J. Her father manages safety compliance for the Daily News printing plant in Jersey City.

The bridegroom, 34, is known as Jay. He is a vice president for management and administration at the Benzel-Busch Motor Car Corporation in Englewood, N.J., an automobile dealership owned by his father. The bridegroom graduated from Boston College. His mother is a psychotherapist in New York. He is a stepson of Darel Agresta.
